title: Про Веру
overview: The lonely girl Vera lives by studying and caring for her sixteen-year-old brother. Vera is trying to replace a difficult teenager with both her mother and father, who have been gone for several years. As a gift of fate, an adult man, a successful businessman-builder, bursts into her life. Passion and a high romantic flight turn into a tragedy for Vera: businessman Maxim turns a large-scale financial scam around the girl, after which she becomes the main person involved in the criminal case.
